frontmatter.title: Grant Watson Software
frontmatter.heading: The dream of a better web
frontmatter.subheading: A software engineer working on one logic problem at a time

mainpitch.title: Why Grant Watson?
mainpitch.description: If you have not guessed it, my name is Grant Watson and I am a freelance software engineer for hire. I love working with the web, its a frontier that allows for so much connection. This portal we call "online" allows for personal growth and professional growth in ANY field.

frontmatter.description: My dream is to change the way we expand on the web. From providing solutions that not everyone considers. I absolutely love my career as a developer.

blurbs.text: It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever your dream may be, if you want to start from the ground up and have something developed that you can access anywhere with an internet connection, contact me today!

As a business, you need to get online. Maybe you have a website right now, but it does not meet your expectations or desires. I work with most frameworks and technologies: Wordpress, ReactJS, C# and will love to work with you to design a beautiful website.

I do not own any servers to host your site, but I will get you set up and running on the best plan for your budget for your web site or application. I also offer my services as a transcriptionist to those who have a podcast, audio file, video, Twitch stream, what have you that needs a transcription of the audio, I will be glad to offer my services to you!

intro.heading: What we offer
intro.description: Kaldi is the ultimate spot for coffee lovers who want to learn about their java’s origin and support the farmers that grew it. We take coffee production, roasting and brewing seriously and we’re glad to pass that knowledge to anyone. This is an edit via identity...
